title: Huge Memorial day sales on appliances from Best Buy, Lowe's, and Home Depot
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Memorial Day sales are here - see the best appliance deals
article: Memorial Day sales are in full swing, and that means it's a fantastic opportunity to score record-low prices on appliances from retailers like Best Buy, Lowe's, Home Depot, and more. To help you find the top deals, we've combed through all the offers to bring you the best Memorial Day appliances sales below. Appliances are one of the most popular categories during Memorial Day sales, with some of the best offers you'll find all year on major appliances like refrigerators, washers and dryers, dishwashers, portable air conditioners, and ranges from brands like Samsung, LG, Whirlpool, and more. Retailers offer deep discounts as well as packaged deals, and Best Buy is even offering up to $500 in gift cards when you purchase four or more select Samsung major appliances. Major appliances aren't the only category discount during the Memorial Day sales event, you can also save big on small appliances, including air fryers, vacuums, coffee makers, the Instant Pot, robot vacs, and so much more. Below you'll find the best Memorial Day sales on major appliances, plus our top deal picks on small appliances, including kitchen devices and vacuums. Keep in mind that most Memorial Day sales end on Monday, so you should take advantage of these epic deals now before it's too late.

See more tech bargains with our roundup of the best Memorial Day TV sales and the best Memorial Day laptop sales. You can also see the best Memorial Day mattress sales and the top Memorial Day appliance sales with deals from Best Buy, Walmart, and Amazon.
